ygData.subject: Re: How to learn a language
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not Tom, but I can answer this question ;)  Yes, you have it right. Spam until the other person gets 2 points, zone, then have them spam you until you get
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not Tom, but I can answer this question ;) Yes, you have it right.
Spam until the other person gets 2 points, zone, then have them spam you
until you get 2 points, zone, and repeat.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard


----- Original Message -----
From: Ashley Dunn <asdunn1@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 28, 1999 12:20 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] How to learn a language


> From: "Ashley Dunn" <asdunn1@...>
>
> Tom, how do you improve a language without learning from someone who is
> excellent? In other words, how would two average speakers of Old Erudian
> work their language skill up? Someone told me that we should group, spam
> each other, get two improves, then zone. Then repeat until you faint. Is
> this correct?
>
